languages.text: "Кучка моих самых отчаянных голово... сотрудников, с которыми я пришел к власти. Деловые партнеры, еще не забывшие, что каждое предприятие настолько крепко, насколько крепка хватка на рукояти пистолета его владельца. Также мои... коллеги из Миссии Касбаллики обеспечили меня группой наемников-ксеносов. Радикальное решение, понимаю, но им плевать, кого убивать, пока я плачу — а мне есть чем заплатить".

"A small band of my most daring cutthro— staff members who were by my side when I came to power. Business partners who still remember that any venture is only as reliable as the grip of the venturer's hand on their pistol. Add to that the group of xenos mercenaries which my... colleagues from the Kasballica Mission have provided me with. A radical solution, I know, but they don't care who they kill as long as I pay them, and I have the means to pay them."
languages.original_text: "Кучка моих самых отчаянных голово... сотрудников, с которыми я пришел к власти. Деловые партнеры, еще не забывшие, что каждое предприятие настолько крепко, насколько крепка хватка на рукояти пистолета его владельца. Также мои... коллеги из Миссии Касбаллики обеспечили меня группой наемников-ксеносов. Радикальное решение, понимаю, но им плевать, кого убивать, пока я плачу — а мне есть чем заплатить".

languages.text: “我身边还有最为胆大包天的杀——幕僚，我才刚刚掌权的时候，这些人就跟在我身边。我还有很多贸易伙伴，他们依然记得，无论是什么样的生意，都只有握着枪的时候才能放心。除此之外，我在……卡斯巴利卡集团的同僚还为我提供了一批异形雇佣兵。我知道这是个很激进的手段，但只要我能付得出钱，他们根本不在乎杀谁，而且我也确实能付得出钱。”
languages.original_text: "A small band of my most daring cutthro— staff members who were by my side when I came to power. Business partners who still remember that any venture is only as reliable as the grip of the venturer's hand on their pistol. Add to that the group of xenos mercenaries which my... colleagues from the Kasballica Mission have provided me with. A radical solution, I know, but they don't care who they kill as long as I pay them, and I have the means to pay them."

traits.locale_text: “我身边还有最为胆大包天的杀——幕僚，我才刚刚掌权的时候，这些人就跟在我身边。我还有很多贸易伙伴，他们依然记得，无论是什么样的生意，都只有握着枪的时候才能放心。除此之外，我在……卡斯巴利卡集团的同僚还为我提供了一批异形雇佣兵。我知道这是个很激进的手段，但只要我能付得出钱，他们根本不在乎杀谁，而且我也确实能付得出钱。”

languages.text: 「一番勇敢な人殺したち。私が権力者になった時、常に側にいてくれた者たち。どんなベンチャーも、ピストルを握る企業者の手ほどしか信用できないと、覚えているビジネスパートナーたち。さらに、異種族の仲間…カスバリカ聖務団の同僚たちが用意してくれた、仲間だ。極端な解決策だというのは、十分承知している。だが、彼らは金さえもられば殺す相手は選ばない。そして私は金なら持っている」
languages.original_text: "A small band of my most daring cutthro— staff members who were by my side when I came to power. Business partners who still remember that any venture is only as reliable as the grip of the venturer's hand on their pistol. Add to that the group of xenos mercenaries which my... colleagues from the Kasballica Mission have provided me with. A radical solution, I know, but they don't care who they kill as long as I pay them, and I have the means to pay them."

traits.locale_text: 「一番勇敢な人殺したち。私が権力者になった時、常に側にいてくれた者たち。どんなベンチャーも、ピストルを握る企業者の手ほどしか信用できないと、覚えているビジネスパートナーたち。さらに、異種族の仲間…カスバリカ聖務団の同僚たちが用意してくれた、仲間だ。極端な解決策だというのは、十分承知している。だが、彼らは金さえもられば殺す相手は選ばない。そして私は金なら持っている」

languages.text: «Una pequeña banda de los miembros del personal de la corte más osados que estuvieron a mi lado cuando me hice con el poder. Socios comerciales que aún recuerdan que la confianza en un negocio depende de quien empuña la pistola. Añádase a eso el grupo de mercenarios xenos que mis... colegas de la Misión Kasballica me han proporcionado. Una solución radical, lo sé, pero no les importa a quién matar mientras les pague, y tengo medios para pagarles».
languages.original_text: "A small band of my most daring cutthro— staff members who were by my side when I came to power. Business partners who still remember that any venture is only as reliable as the grip of the venturer's hand on their pistol. Add to that the group of xenos mercenaries which my... colleagues from the Kasballica Mission have provided me with. A radical solution, I know, but they don't care who they kill as long as I pay them, and I have the means to pay them."

traits.locale_text: «Una pequeña banda de los miembros del personal de la corte más osados que estuvieron a mi lado cuando me hice con el poder. Socios comerciales que aún recuerdan que la confianza en un negocio depende de quien empuña la pistola. Añádase a eso el grupo de mercenarios xenos que mis... colegas de la Misión Kasballica me han proporcionado. Una solución radical, lo sé, pero no les importa a quién matar mientras les pague, y tengo medios para pagarles».

languages.text: "Eine kleine Bande meiner verwegensten Halsabsch- Mitarbeiter, die an meiner Seite standen, als ich an die Macht gekommen bin. Geschäftspartner, die sich noch daran erinnern, dass jede Unternehmung nur so zuverlässig ist wie der Griff des Unternehmers an seiner Pistole. Dazu kommt noch die Gruppe von Xenos-Söldnern, die mir meine ... Kollegen von der Kasballica-Mission zur Verfügung gestellt haben. Eine radikale Lösung, ich weiß, doch es ist ihnen egal, wen sie töten, so lange ich sie bezahle, und ich habe die Mittel, um sie zu bezahlen."
languages.original_text: "A small band of my most daring cutthro— staff members who were by my side when I came to power. Business partners who still remember that any venture is only as reliable as the grip of the venturer's hand on their pistol. Add to that the group of xenos mercenaries which my... colleagues from the Kasballica Mission have provided me with. A radical solution, I know, but they don't care who they kill as long as I pay them, and I have the means to pay them."

traits.locale_text: "Eine kleine Bande meiner verwegensten Halsabsch- Mitarbeiter, die an meiner Seite standen, als ich an die Macht gekommen bin. Geschäftspartner, die sich noch daran erinnern, dass jede Unternehmung nur so zuverlässig ist wie der Griff des Unternehmers an seiner Pistole. Dazu kommt noch die Gruppe von Xenos-Söldnern, die mir meine ... Kollegen von der Kasballica-Mission zur Verfügung gestellt haben. Eine radikale Lösung, ich weiß, doch es ist ihnen egal, wen sie töten, so lange ich sie bezahle, und ich habe die Mittel, um sie zu bezahlen."

languages.text: « Un petit groupe de mes plus audacieux band... agents qui étaient à mes côtés quand j'ai pris le pouvoir, et des associés qui se souviennent encore que la fiabilité d'une entreprise dépend de l'habileté au tir de son entrepreneur. Ajoutez à ça un groupe de mercenaires xénos que mes... collègues de la Mission de la Kasballica m'ont fourni. Je sais, c'est une solution radicale, mais ils sont prêts à tuer n'importe qui tant que je les paie, et j'en ai les moyens. »
languages.original_text: "A small band of my most daring cutthro— staff members who were by my side when I came to power. Business partners who still remember that any venture is only as reliable as the grip of the venturer's hand on their pistol. Add to that the group of xenos mercenaries which my... colleagues from the Kasballica Mission have provided me with. A radical solution, I know, but they don't care who they kill as long as I pay them, and I have the means to pay them."

traits.locale_text: « Un petit groupe de mes plus audacieux band... agents qui étaient à mes côtés quand j'ai pris le pouvoir, et des associés qui se souviennent encore que la fiabilité d'une entreprise dépend de l'habileté au tir de son entrepreneur. Ajoutez à ça un groupe de mercenaires xénos que mes... collègues de la Mission de la Kasballica m'ont fourni. Je sais, c'est une solution radicale, mais ils sont prêts à tuer n'importe qui tant que je les paie, et j'en ai les moyens. »

languages.text: "Başa geçtiğimden beri yanımdan ayrılmayan en yürekli boğazkes... yani askerlerlerim bulunuyor bu küçük bölükte. Bir de silahını ne kadar sıkı tutarsa girişimlerinin o kadar başarılı olacağını bilen iş ortaklarım. Ek olarak bir grup zenomuz var, paralı askerler... Kasballica Misyonu sağ olsun. Uç bir çözüm, farkındayım ama paraları ödendiği sürece kimi öldürdükleri umurlarında olmuyor. Bende de para bol."
languages.original_text: "A small band of my most daring cutthro— staff members who were by my side when I came to power. Business partners who still remember that any venture is only as reliable as the grip of the venturer's hand on their pistol. Add to that the group of xenos mercenaries which my... colleagues from the Kasballica Mission have provided me with. A radical solution, I know, but they don't care who they kill as long as I pay them, and I have the means to pay them."
